yuddhaya awasan kara rata thula maha sanwardhana sangramayak siduwana mohothaka, ema kriyawaliya aapassata harawimata atham batahira rajyayan kumanthranaya karamin sitina bawa , widulibala ha balashakthi amathini pawithra wanniaarachchi prakasha kalaya.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathithumage meheyawima matha kriyathmaka 'rata rakina nil pawura surakimu mawbima' sammanthrana malawa yatathe kabithigollawen aarambha keruna shri lanka nidahas paksha kantha sanwidhanaye kala wawa balamandala niyojitha sammelanayata sahabhagi wemin amathini pawithra wanniaarachchi me bawa pawasuwaya.shri lankawata erehi jathyanthara kumanthrana parajaya kirime mahajana balawegaya shakthimath kirimata rate siyalu kanthawan peramuna gathayuthu bawada, rata thula yuddhaya awasan wi godanagemin pawathina sanwardhana kriyawaliya atham batahira rajyayanta daraganimata nohaki bawada penwadun amathiwariya, owunge aramuna yali diwayina thula thrasthawadaya wapirawima bawada kiya.ratakata wadagath wanne rate nayakayage darshanaya ha prathipaththiya bawada mahinda rajapaksha yanu dakmak sahitha nayakayek bawada wanniaarachcha mahathmiya kiwaya.
ee sandaha kalayuthu palamu rajakariya wanne jathiwadi sarpayata sangawennata ida nodi eliyata ada thala damimaya.

adhirajyaye nagarika kendra saha, dusiyanwaru (rajakiya mudal achchu pilibanda adhyakshawaru), baliyanwaru (pradhana rajakiya wasthu widyagnyayo) saha dediyanwaru (wedibeheth palakayan saha karmika karmanthashala kalamanakarawaru) athulath athishayin dhanawath konsthanthinopal-padanam wu amira panthiya harunu wita, boho aarmeniyanuwo ‚Äì dala washayen owunge janagahanayen 70% k pamana ‚Äì jiwath wuye dugi saha anathurudayaka thaththwayan yatathe gramiya pitisara palath walaya.

panadura dakunu polisiye siramadiriye ibbage yathuru agula galawagena ehi siti sakakaruwan dedenethu 01-03-14 dina pandara yame pala yame siddhiya gana parikshana pawathwu panadura sahakara polis adhikari nuwan mandis mahatha polis parikshaka thilakarathna saha sarayan thennakon yana polis niladharin dedenagewada thahanam karana thibe.sira madiriyen palagos aththe mathkudu langa thaba ganima saha horakam kirima sambandhayen adhikarana niyogayak matha siramadiriye radawa gena siti sakakaruwek saha thawath sakakaruwek bawa usas polis niladhariyek pawasiyapalagiya ek sakakaruwek ewelema ath adanguwata gath athara anith sakakaru panadura modarawila pudeshaye sangawi sitiyadi edina dahawal ath adanguwata gena atha.

as banda thabuwath, ee margaya soya yamata mata puluwan.‚Äù ‚Äúrajagahanuwara sita, sawath purayata pamina padinchiwi sitina obe hithamithuran, rajagahanuwarata yana gaman margaya oba itha hondin danna bawa wishwasa karanawa neda?‚Äù ‚Äúeseya swamini, ma langin asurukarana aya eya dannawa.‚Äù ‚Äúsamaharak awasthawala kenaku pamina rajagaha nuwarata yana gaman margaya gana wisthara ahuwoth, oba eya hondin pahadili kara denawa neda?‚Äù ‚Äúswamini, kisiwak wasan nokarama, ma owunta eya pahadili kara denawa.
